attributes.contentHtml:
1. We are waiting for the ToS and PP from a external company who i paid 60$ for. (From the person who mastermined stole the ToS from)
  2. There is only 4 released nodes currently
  3. Our team has responded to most trustpolit reviews and agree a few months ago our uptime was not the best. Over the last few months however we have seen a very high increase in uptime, Node 2 sitting at 98% and node 3 sitting at just above 95% as logged by stats from the status page.
  4. There was never any legal action against listed.host however there was a talk of one but it was a miss-understanding and i have since apologised to Xcyth
  5. Site is currently broken due to the lack of devs. i have just finished overtime on my job where i spent 6 out of 7days working and i have just ended a 1.5year contract with another host i was part of as a sys-admin giving me more time to work on DBH as a company and hiring people.
  6. However one giant thing i do agree with is the discord server, its toxic as hell, personally i wouldnt want to be near a server that toxic
  7. About the sue against listed.host that was never made by any of the company staff. it was made by a memeber who stole ToS and PP. If someone still has the screenshot of that i would like to get a copy of that please so i can send it to the person who mastermined stole the ToS and PP from
Dan1 ok Dan the guy who "stole tos" his real name is Beatriz Alanis, Former CEO of JourneyHost also you still operating without tos and privacy policy
